participant_1.background:
I am so happy to be close to my parents and my daughters are really excited about our new home.
I'm afraid of being judged for my ethnicity.
i like to draw and paint in my spare time.
i love owning nice office supplies.
I am not sure if I am a healthy person, but I know that I am trying my best.

participant_2.background:
I broke my arm when I was a child, but it healed well.
i wonder about what life in space would be like.
I haven't had time to swim lately because of my schedule.
I'm proud of my ability to persevere through difficult times and continue to succeed in my career.
I usually pray and read the Bible before I start my day.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing great! I just moved into a new home with my daughters, and we're all really excited about it.
That's wonderful! I'm sure you're all going to have a lot of fun together in your new home.
Thank you, I think so too! I'm really happy to be close to my parents again, and my daughters are excited to have a big backyard to play in.
That's great! I'm sure you'll all have a lot of fun together. I'm happy for you!
Thanks! I appreciate it. How about you, what are you up to these days?
I'm pretty busy with work right now, but I'm also trying to get back into swimming. I used to swim a lot when I was younger, but I haven't had much time for it lately.
That's great! I love swimming too. I used to swim competitively when I was younger, but I don't have much time for it anymore either.
Maybe we can go swimming together sometime!
That would be fun! I'm free on Saturday if you are.
I'm free on Saturday too! I'll text you my number so we can figure out details.
Great! I'm looking forward to it!
